TopicTitle: Training appears to be messed up :C

Articles.Content:
So I was struggling with getting to the Mun, so I decided to try out training and do the Orbit thing. I got somewhat far into the training until it told me to get a liquid fueled engine. It only allowed me two engines (Terrier and Hammer) but it is telling me to use the Swivel. Am I doing the training wrong somehow or is the game just messed up?

Image:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HHbB2Aljj98r6VcFb4QIQp-n7ynPlqEH/view?usp=sharing
There's a big in which the Swivel engine doesn't show up, but I don't know the specifics.

10 hours ago, DiamondRBX said:

So I was struggling with getting to the Mun, so I decided to try out training and do the Orbit thing. I got somewhat far into the training until it told me to get a liquid fueled engine. It only allowed me two engines (Terrier and Hammer) but it is telling me to use the Swivel. Am I doing the training wrong somehow or is the game just messed up?

The Swivel engine was revamped at some point, given a new internal name, and the old one was 'obsoleted' by hiding it from the default tech tree category. They forgot to adapt the training though, so it's still trying to point to an engine that is now 'missing'.

If you 'Enable advanced mode' (top left), and go to the tech level category, you can still find it in level 2.

Pictures or it didn't get explained:

Spoiler

Swivel engine 'missing' in Training? Click on 'Enabled advanced mode' in the top left.

A new row of filter buttons appears. Click the one that says 'Filter by Tech Level'.

Then click on the '2'.

The old Swivel is back again!

Select and place it, and you can continue your training.
